Back to school DDR Packages
£70.00
+ VAT / PER PERSON
Available from September ~ November 2019
Minimum numbers of 100 apply

It’s time to sharpen your pencils, dig out your satchel and find out who will be top of the class with the London Stadium’s ‘Back to School’ DDR package.

Room hire 9am – 5pm
Arrival tea and coffee with pastries
Mid-morning tea and coffee with biscuits
Dinner lady’s buffet, a selection of sandwiches and three finger food items
Mid-afternoon tea and coffee with ‘Teacher’s Pet’ treat
Water served throughout the day
Retro table sweets
After school Stadium Tour

Find our more
We’re here to help

An inspirational venue for inspirational meetings

Get in touch on 0208 522 6139
for more information and to book

We support a range of events

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

  • Meetings & Conferences
  • Dinners & Dances
  • Private Parties
  • Christmas Parties
  • Weddings
  • Team Build

The venue truly comes to life for evening events. Consider starting your evening with a short tour visiting the changing rooms, player's tunnel and dugout before drinks are taken with either views of the City of London or the stadium bowl prior to dinner. Whether entertaining clients, staff, or celebrating the end of a school or university term, everyone will be wowed by the stadium facilities and history.

Be it an awards, celebration or fundraiser dinner; a formal, fun or themed event; a prom or university ball, we have the space for you. In addition, we can offer full event management so just talk to us about your vision and we will create it. We can source anything from table centres to lighting and theming to entertainment.

We know that you take your food and wine very seriously and so do we. We have created menus that we believe you will like, but if there is anything specific that you require, then please let us know and we will arrange for the chef to create a menu especially for you.

Contact the team on 020 8522 6139 for details of our dinner packages.

Our tailor-made events

Exciting venues

Inspirational venues, the limit is your imagination.

  • Stylish, modern venue spaces
  • 9 event spaces and 16 boxes.
  • Sit down dinner for up to 300
  • Drinks receptions for up to 1,000
  • Marquee options available
  • Some rooms over-looking the bowl of the stadium
  • Other rooms overlooking the City of London
Explore our spaces

Creative food and drink

Inspirational venues, the limit is your imagination.

  • Creative food and drink by award winning Delaware North
  • Innovative event menus
  • Award winning chefs
  • Flexible to meet your requirements
  • Healthy and sustainable products
  • Great presentation
  • Bespoke menus available
  • A great team with the personal touch

  • Ingenious photography
  • Props and themes
  • Whatever you want – we will source it
